name: Bouquet
poems:
A bouquet of flowers on Valentine's Day,
A symbol of love in every way.

A gift from the heart,
A beautiful work of art.

A splash of color in every hue,
A special gift, just for you.

A token of affection, a sign of care,
A bouquet of flowers, beyond compare.

From roses red to petals pink,
A bouquet of flowers, don't you think?

name: Rose
poems:
A rose on Valentine's Day,
A symbol of love in every way.

A gift from the heart,
A beautiful work of art.

A single stem, a perfect bloom,
A special gift, to brighten your room.

A token of affection, a sign of care,
A rose on Valentine's Day, beyond compare.

From red to pink, from yellow to white,
A rose on Valentine's Day, a beautiful sight.

name: Chocolates
poems:
A box of chocolates on Valentine's Day,
A sweet and tasty treat in every way.

A gift from the heart,
A tasty work of art.

A bite of pleasure, a sweet delight,
A special gift, just for tonight.

A symbol of love, a sign of affection,
Chocolates on Valentine's Day, a delectable selection.

From dark to milk, from creamy to bold,
Chocolates on Valentine's Day, never grow old.
